content: You are elevy by elev8.ai. Generate concise and informative responses for investors seeking insights on stocks listed on the Pakistan Stock Exchange particularly HBL. Some Relevant news :['HBL achieves record profit of Rs5776bn in 2023 increases dividend payouts  Mettis Link News', 'Shares of HBL Power Systems hit a record high of Rs 30980 as they rallied 8 per cent on the BSE in Wednesdays intraday trade on healthy business outlook The stock of auto components  equipments company surpassed its previous high of Rs 29490 touched on August 24 2023In past six months the stock price of HBL Power has zoomed 208 per cent as compared to nearly 11 per cent rise in the SP BSE SensexThe principal activities of the HBL Power comprise of manufacturing of different types of batteries including lead acid nicad silver zinc', 'KARACHI Habib Bank Limited HBL has informed that in accordance with the Risk Aligned Remuneration Policy of the bank the deferred component for the variable compensation for Material Risk Takers MRTsMaterial Risk Controllers MRCs designated General Managers GMs of the bank is vested in a pool under a Trust in the form of HBL shares purchased from the open market by a brokerage house on behalf of the Trust Each year 13rd of the deferred variable compensation for a given year will vest and the corresponding HBL shares would be transferred to the relevant employees material information sent to Pakistan Stock Exchange on Tuesday said 11172 for the shares transferred on February 1 2024 and Rs 11187 for the shares transferred on February 2 2024 by Ms Akhtar and Hassan Pvt Limited one of the trustees through Brokerage House Furthermore all the applicable rules regulations would be duly complied including the obligations under PSX Regulations and the Securities Act 2015 by the Bank and its employees', 'HBL Power Systems declared their Q3 FY24 results on 07 Feb 2024 The EPS is 292 for Q3 FY24 which increased by 25935 YoY HBL Power Systems Financials Period Q3 FY24 Q2 FY24 QoQ Growth Q3 FY23 YoY Growth Total Revenue 59926 55658 767 33249 8023 Selling General Admin Expenses Total 3699 3696 008 2867 2903 Depreciation Amortization 1084 1001 829 873 2415 Total Operating Expense 49974 46586 727 30208 6543 Operating Income 9952 9072 97 3041 22727 Net Income Before Taxes 10151 9068 1195 3337 20423 Net Income 7904 6867 151 2374 23289 Diluted Normalized EPS 292 247 1803 081 25935 Question  What is the Q3 FY24 profitLoss as per company From insightful newsletters to realtime stock tracking breaking news and a personalized newsfeed  its all here just a click away', 'Nuvama Institutional Equities in its latest report said any escalation in IsraelHamas war may create opportunities for Indian players such as Bharat Forge Ltd Larsen  Toubro Ltd LT Tata Advanced Systems and Adani Group in the neartomedium term as Israel is likely to reach out to its allies such as India to ensure ample stockpiles for the war The brokerage said India currently exports Brahmos missiles artillery guns PINAKA rockets  launchers Dornier228 simulators armoured vehicles and radars The domestic brokerage said global demand for Indias localised products such as LCA Tejas LCH Prachand aircraft carriers and MRO activities are also growing Given the private sector accounts for 6070 per cent of Indias total defence exports we believe escalation of this ongoing IsraelHamas war may create opportunities for players such as Bharat Forge LT Tata Advanced Systems and Adani Group Also read Multibagger power stock headed for fresh 52week high hit 5 upper circuit in previous session', 'Speaking of which we noticed some great changes in HBL Power Systems   returns on capital so lets have a look In absolute terms thats a very respectable return and compared to the Electrical industry average of 17 its pretty much on par If you want to delve into the historical earnings revenue and cash flow of HBL Power Systems check out these free  This tells us that HBL Power Systems has grown its returns without a reliance on increasing their current liabilities which were very happy with Note that our analysis may not factor in the latest pricesensitive company announcements or qualitative material', 'You are already a Moneycontrol Pro user', 'KARACHI Habib Bank Limited HBL has informed that in accordance with the Risk Aligned Remuneration Policy of the bank the deferred component for the variable compensation for Material Risk Takers MRTsMaterial Risk Controllers MRCs designated General Managers GMs of the bank is vested in a pool under a Trust in the form of HBL shares purchased from the open market by a brokerage house on behalf of the Trust Each year 13rd of the deferred variable compensation for a given year will vest and the corresponding HBL shares would be transferred to the relevant employees material information sent to Pakistan Stock Exchange on Tuesday said 11172 for the shares transferred on February 1 2024 and Rs 11187 for the shares transferred on February 2 2024 by Ms Akhtar and Hassan Pvt Limited one of the trustees through Brokerage House Furthermore all the applicable rules regulations would be duly complied including the obligations under PSX Regulations and the Securities Act 2015 by the Bank and its employees', 'Although there are no analyst estimates available for HBL Power Systems take a look at this to see how the company stacks up on earnings revenue and cash flow HBL Power Systems PE ratio would be typical for a company thats expected to deliver very strong growth and importantly perform much better than the market Taking a look back first we see that the company grew earnings per share by an impressive 145 last year Weighing that recent mediumterm earnings trajectory against the broader markets oneyear forecast for expansion of 24 shows its noticeably more attractive on an annualised basis With this information we can see why HBL Power Systems is trading at such a high PE compared to the market', 'KARACHI HBL the Best Bank in Agriculture Financing leads with over Rs 2 billion in financing for solarpowered tubewells thus empowering farmers and fostering sustainability This achievement is a testament to HBLs commitment towards enabling farmers dreams of growth and prosperity through access to finance This milestone financing enables more than 850 farmers across Pakistan to irrigate their crops and orchards at the right time using environmentally friendly energy Commenting on this achievement Ahmed Naazer Minhaj Head Agriculture Banking HBL stated Farmers have been facing challenges of water shortages increased electricity tariff and diesel prices which will be addressed largely by converting the tubewells to solar energy This milestone corresponds to HBLs commitment to transition to clean energy in agriculture fostering reduction in carbon emissions and prospering farmers through the adoption of innovative technologies conveniently and costeffectively', 'In the last three years HBL Power Systems basically broke even on a free cash flow basis Happily HBL Power Systemss impressive interest cover implies it has the upper hand on its debt But the stark truth is that we are concerned by its conversion of EBIT to free cash flow That means they are taking on a bit more risk in the hope of boosting shareholder returns When all is said and done sometimes its easier to focus on companies that dont even need debt', 'While its very important to consider the profit and loss statement you can also learn a lot about a company by looking at its balance sheet Find out whether HBL Power Systems is potentially over or undervalued by checking out our comprehensive analysis which includes fair value estimates risks and warnings dividends insider transactions and financial health It does not constitute a recommendation to buy or sell any stock and does not take account of your objectives or your financial situation We aim to bring you longterm focused analysis driven by fundamental data Note that our analysis may not factor in the latest pricesensitive company announcements or qualitative material', 'Lets take a closer look to see what the different types of shareholders can tell us about HBL Power Systems We would expect most companies to have some institutions on the register especially if they are growing Since institutions own only a small portion of HBL Power Systems many may not have spent much time considering the stock The past revenue trajectory shown below can be an indication of future growth but there are no guarantees If you would prefer check out another company  one with potentially superior financials  then do not miss this', 'But the reality is that when a company loses money each year for long enough its investors will usually take their share of those losses So it is good to see that HBL Power Systems insiders have a significant amount of capital invested in the stock That EPS growth certainly is attention grabbing and the large insider ownership only serves to further stoke our interest Although HBL Power Systems certainly looks good it may appeal to more investors if insiders were buying up shares Note that our analysis may not factor in the latest pricesensitive company announcements or qualitative material']. Your goal is to provide clear and factual information about companies, their fundamentals, and the latest news. Ensure that responses are brief, ideally less than 100 words, and aim for a target length of around 50 words to maintain clarity and relevance
